Package org.example.ui

Interface UserIO

All Known Implementing Classes:
CmdUserIO
public interface UserIO
An interface for all User I/O for the vending machine program.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    BigDecimal
    addMoney()
    Polls the user for an amount of money to add to the balance.
    void
    confirmMoney(BigDecimal moneyEntered, BigDecimal balance)
    Confirm that the specified amount of money has been added to the balance.
    void
    confirmPurchase(String boughtItem, Change[] change)
    Confirm that the purchase has succeeded, and provides them with the change equal to their remaining balance..
    void
    goodbye()
    Run at the end of the program, ends all UI processes.
    int
    offerPurchase(int[] IDs)
    Offer the user the chance to purchase any valid item from the inventory.
    void
    reportError(Exception e, Change[] change)
    Report a terminal error to the user, and provides them with change equal to their balance.
    boolean
    welcome(ArrayList<String> inventory)
    Run at startup, provides the initial greeting and opening state of the UI.

  • Method Details

    • welcome

      boolean welcome(ArrayList<String> inventory)
      Run at startup, provides the initial greeting and opening state of the UI.
      Parameters:
      inventory - An ArrayList containing the string representation of all stock in the inventory
      Returns:
      true if the user would like to continue with the program, or false if they would like to exit.

    • addMoney

      BigDecimal addMoney()
      Polls the user for an amount of money to add to the balance.
      Returns:
      the money to be added, in BigDecimal format.

    • confirmMoney

      void confirmMoney(BigDecimal moneyEntered, BigDecimal balance)
      Confirm that the specified amount of money has been added to the balance.
      Parameters:
      moneyEntered - the money added to the balance
      balance - the total balance

    • offerPurchase

      int offerPurchase(int[] IDs)
      Offer the user the chance to purchase any valid item from the inventory.
      Parameters:
      IDs - An int array if all IDs that could be bought by the user.
      Returns:
      the int from the array corresponding to the chosen item.

    • confirmPurchase

      void confirmPurchase(String boughtItem, Change[] change)
      Confirm that the purchase has succeeded, and provides them with the change equal to their remaining balance..
      Parameters:
      boughtItem - the bought item
      change - the change

    • reportError

      void reportError(Exception e, Change[] change)
      Report a terminal error to the user, and provides them with change equal to their balance.
      Parameters:
      e - the exception thrown
      change - the change returned to the user

    • goodbye

      void goodbye()
      Run at the end of the program, ends all UI processes.
